metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1402 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The default configuration for bccache.FileSystemBytecodeCache in Jinja2before 2.7.2 does not properly create temporary files, which allows localusers to gain privileges via a crafted .cache file with a name startingwith __jinja2_ in /tmp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-jinja2 - 2.7.2-2
python3-jinja2 - 2.7.2-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jinja2 package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.2-2').
